name: change_roof_thermal_properties

arguments.name: r_value_mult
arguments.display_name: Multiplier for R-value of the Roof

arguments.name: solar_abs_mult
arguments.display_name: Multiplier for Solar Absorptance of the outer layer of the Roof

arguments.name: thermal_mass_mult
arguments.display_name: Multiplier for Thermal Mass of the Roof

modeler_description: Tunes all roof surfaces by providing separate calibration multipliers to thermal resistance, thermal mass, and solar absorptance.
description: Allows calibration of roof by altering the thermal resistance, density, and solar absorptance of the wall constructions independently.
